items.sentence: Tom eventually figured out how to install a free database application on his computer.
Tom got stuck with the whole bill when he went out drinking with Mary and her friends.
Tom has been trying to get Mary to marry him ever since he graduated from high school.
Tom is a high school history teacher and a part-time harmonica player in a blues band.
Now that Tom is taking proper medication, he should be able to control himself better.
She asked him to give her some money so she could go to a restaurant with her friends.
Sooner or later, someone is going to have to tell Tom that he needs to behave himself.
The company provides health care and life insurance benefits for all of its employees.
I heard that Tom had been smuggling drugs into America for years before he got caught.
I haven\'t heard anything from him since then. I wonder what in the world he\'s doing.
